name: InfluenzaVaccine_HD_CN_Grouping
title: Influenza Vaccine_HD_CN_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the Influenza Vaccine - Adult Care Need.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Influenza Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Influenza Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Influenza Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Influenza Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
